info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 6 at 5:10PM MST until May 6 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Las Vegas NV
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Southwestern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona...
* Until 615 PM MST.
* At 509 PM MST, a wall of dust was near Blake Ranch Road, or 18 miles east of Kingman, moving south at 30 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility.
SOURCE...Detected by webcam.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
*
This includes the following roads... Antares Road between mile markers 1 and 11. Route 66 between mile markers 61 and 80. Stockton Hill Road between mile markers 13 and 21.
This dust channel will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Mohave County.
info.instruction: Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 6:15 PM MST. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 6:15 PM MST. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:15 PM MST. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:15 PM MST. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
